infodynamics.utils

Class ArrayFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.utils.ArrayFileWriter

  • public class ArrayFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes basic files with one or two dimensional arrays of integers and doubles and booleans, delimited by tab.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)

                              throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        outputFileName - output filename
